Posts.Content: Hi I have had WLE Nov2014 &radiotherapy x15 sessions completed Feb2015 apart from skin breakdown after rads I feel I have coped well, or so I tell myself. This morning I notice nipple looks 'strange' I have apt on Moday with oncologist ,it's scary and I have gone into meltdown I know I need to deal with this but felt writing it down might help Thanks Jeu
Posts.Title: Surgey and Radiotherapy completed what next???

Posts.Content: Thank you It's helpful to know someone else has had similar issues, I'm sure you are right , I think I am stressing at slightest thing Thanks againxx
Posts.Title: Surgey and Radiotherapy completed what next???

Posts.Content: Hi  I have had WLE and 3weeks radiotherapy which finished last Tuesday .I am having pins& needle type pains in breast which brings tears at times, my underarm and scar area have bcome very sore and inflamed .I am really struggling to know what to do for comfort, I have managed to work throughout my treatment but suddenly find myself falling into a dark hole. Any tips most welcome. Thanks
Posts.Title: Nerve type pain following radiotherapy

Posts.Content: Hi Thanks for your support I will ring GP and try to get prescription ,I have had to keep working to try and be normal!!!! Hugs xxx
Posts.Title: Nerve type pain following radiotherapy
